column2:
This will replace the appearance of any back item and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe. 

This backpack skin has no stats of its own.
Smash ten pieces of furniture in World 2, Zone 2 of Super Adventure Box.

This will replace the appearance of any back item and unlock the backpack skin and the glider in your account wardrobe.

This backpack skin has no stats of its own.
Double-click to choose an ascended orange Super Adventure Box weapon.
